attributes.action: put a stop to the massive increase in local council tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I  feel it is time  for us the peolple to use are numbers AGAIN to make a stand against what can only be described as the rape and pillage of our wallets on a yeariy basis. I understand that taxation is the way in which this countrys ecomey survives but feel strongly that the massive yearly percentage increase is to much  .I know from my own experience that my local council seem to be doing less and less yet chargeing more and more, time has come for us the people to make a stand once more and say no to unreasonble increases and keep them low or all say NO.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
